name: Scope
text:
PART II.  GENERAL RULES

 §431:10-201    The provisions of this part shall apply to all classes or lines of insurance except:



	(1)	Ocean marine insurance as defined in section 431:1-211,
	(2)	Surplus line insurance, as defined in section [431:8-102], and
	(3)	Life insurance, or accident and health or sickness insurance; provided the contracts are neither issued for delivery in this State nor delivered in this State. [L 1987, c 347, pt of §2; am L 2002, c 155, §38]
